verses.roman:
'herā-pañcamī'ra dina āila jāniyā
kāśī-miśre kahe rājā sayatna kariyā

synonyms: herā-pañcamīra dina—the day of Herā-pañcamī; āila—was nearing; jāniyā—knowing; kāśī-miśre—unto Kāśī Miśra; kahe—says; rājā—the King; sa-yatna kariyā—with great attention.
translation: Knowing that the Herā-pañcamī festival was drawing near, King Pratāparudra attentively talked with Kāśī Miśra.
